prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Strings, Piano, Brass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Strings, Piano, Brass - but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Strings, Piano, Brass - Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Strings, Piano, Brass - Reed is not included.
